name: Chimera Co.
description: You are a new employee for the secret organization, Chimera Co. Your task is simple: Fulfill your quota. The boss is in regular need of various creations for his nefarious plots, and it is your role to provide. The various orders of monster combinations are on the screen. Match these components and ship them off to the boss as quickly as possible. You don’t want to end up like the last guy!
